evidence.claim: Anytime Care utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, indicating it follows both the privacy and security rules outlined for healthcare applications.
Anytime Care supports FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
The use of Twilio API for communication services shows integration capabilities for telehealth solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes X12 for healthcare transactions and integrates with various health tech APIs.
